product_name: prAna Bronson Shorts - Men's 11" Inseam - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Durable and stretchy, the prAna Bronson 11 in. shorts are an all-purpose adventurer's dream come true. Casual everyday styling mixes with features that let you veer off the trails to the nearest rock. Breathable, stretch-woven cotton canvas with a peached finish is reinforced with triple needle stitching and rivets to enhance both durability and style. Inseam gusset and a bit of spandex facilitate freedom of movement. Zip fly with button closure; standard 5-pocket styling. Closeout.
short_description: Durable and stretchy, the prAna Bronson 11 in. shorts are an all-purpose adventurer's dream come true. Casual everyday styling mixes with features that let you veer off the trails to the nearest rock.
